name: Donald Stewart
description: I am intelligent and resourceful, and will sometimes make you laugh and shake your head. Sweet and loving are words often used by others to describe me. You will find me refreshingly honest with a positive and optimistic attitude. I enjoy the magic of love and am very amorous and passionate. I’d like to one day find myself in a genuine, loving and exclusive relationship i am very sensitive emotional and romantic i love to please and make my woman feel like she have never felt befor i learnt that from my DAD and i have lived all my life treating people around me good cause i have the believe that people has to be treated the way u want them to treat you in return. I love walking, hiking, going to art shows, museums, plays, movies and local events. Traveling and experiencing new adventures is a joy. I savior being in nature as much as having a glass of wine with a good meal. Like a chameleon, I adjust easily to fancy outings or down-to-earth activities. I have raised one wonderful kid who is on is own life journeys. I am self-employed and live alone with my part-time dog. She’s a cute medium-sized mix.
